items.title: Trump’s tariffs are unfair to most Americans. Here’s how they could actually be beneficial.
items.description: Instead of blanket tariffs, an ethical policy shows a clear and justifiable need for protection.

items.title: Is the stock market open on the Fourth of July — and what time does it close on July 3? What about FedEx, UPS and mail delivery?
items.description: Independence Day comes with many closures — although it may be a good time to hit the stores.

items.title: ‘My whole financial world is upside down’: I’m ‘medically retired’ at 51 with $428K in stocks. Is this enough to live on?
items.description: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas.”

items.title: My mother, 89, keeps getting her credit card scammed. She gets a new one — and it happens again. What’s going on?
What’s in your 401(k)? Why you need to know — especially boomers and Generation X
items.description: Your target-date fund might have the wrong mix for you, and new alternatives could be risky.
